intro: Psychotria microphylla, commonly known as the dwarf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Psychotria microphylla is often found in lowland rainforests and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
